2.speaker: Minsc
2.text: Bah! Fine, Boo. Lae'zel - my hamster wishes me to tell you:
2.context: NodeContext: Giving in to Boo's nagging.

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: You are the most beautiful thing he has ever seen.
0.context: NodeContext: Not outright disgusted and mean, but really doesn't want to be the messenger here.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: I'm afraid I can't return the sentiment - but I know of some githyanki who would find him quite... appealing. Mouth-watering, in fact.
